data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 4,440 believers in Mzimba to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mzimba, Malawi
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Mzimba, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Mzimba, Malawi to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 15,314 cultural Christians in the state of Mzimba to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Swahili people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Mzimba, Malawi by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Mzimba, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mzimba, Malawi has a population of 26,100.

We estimate Mzimba has 4,440 people who might know Jesus, 15,314 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,347 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Mzimba, Malawi.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
